page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT 2
page.content: Most of the firms in the Newton Abbot area are small firms. There are one or two large firms that employ quite a few people, e.g.Centrax and W.B.B. who quarry pipe clay. The local authority Teignbridge Council are trying to encourage small firms to set up in the area by setting aside land for small industrial estates, such as at{Decoy {and{Brunel Road.} The{A.R.C. (Amalgamated Roadstones {Corporation)}has a 75 acre quarry which extracts 800 tons of sand and gravel a day. They expect reserves to last at least 10 years. The sand and gravel is dug up, put on a conveyor belt, cleaned by water and sorted into different grades of sand and gravel. { {A.R.C.}have interests all over the world, including gold mines. There are many dangers at the quarry on average there is only one accident a year.
